TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Greg_Ballard, title = Greg_Ballard, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greg_Ballard} }

S.FORM: Greg Ballard Greg Ballard nalecuhan i Los Angeles, California, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Greg Ballard i 1977 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 4, namapili' tu nu Washington Bullets putiput. 2 bulad 29 demiad, 1955 a mihca, Greg Ballard, miunduay. (mapatay i 2016 a mihca) u canan ku NBA kanatal kanas-mali putiput, Amilika: National Basketball Association, sapuyu'en NBA, u Amis-Amilika tatama syubay kanas-mali putiput. izaw 30 a mali cebang, mikitinay tusa a subal, sawaliyan atu satipan. cacay subal izaw tulu a cu, cacay a cu izaw lima a cebang, cacay cebang namakay Canada, u zama sa namakay Amilika. kya madademec "Amilika syubay kanas-mali nisakaput sasasedsed, acasa "Amilika kanas nisakaput sasasedsed", sapuyu'en "Amilika syubay kanas", acasa kakelul han NBA.

Greg Ballard Greg Ballard nalecohan i Los Angeles, California, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Greg Ballard i 1977 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ko owac ato silsil 4, namapili' to no Washington Bollets potipot. 2 bolad 29 demiad, 1955 a mihca, Greg Ballard, miondoay. (mapatay i 2016 a mihca) o canan ko NBA kanatal kanas-mali potipot, Amilika: National Basketball Association, sapoyo'en NBA, o Amis-Amilika tatama syobay kanas-mali potipot. izaw 30 a mali cebang, mikitinay tosa a sobal, sawaliyan ato satipan. cacay sobal izaw tolo a co, cacay a co izaw lima a cebang, cacay cebang namakay Canada, o zama sa namakay Amilika. kya madademec "Amilika syobay kanas-mali nisakapot sasasedsed, acasa "Amilika kanas nisakapot sasasedsed", sapoyo'en "Amilika syobay kanas", acasa kakelol han NBA.
